description: Configuration option for protocols http and https

certificates.description: IDs of the Certificates to use for TLS/SSL termination by the Load Balancer; empty for TLS/SSL passthrough or if `protocol` is `http`.

cookie_lifetime.description: Lifetime of the cookie used for sticky sessions (in seconds).

cookie_name.description: Name of the cookie used for sticky sessions.

redirect_http.description: Redirect HTTP requests to HTTPS. Only available if `protocol` is `https`.

sticky_sessions.description: Use sticky sessions. Only available if `protocol` is `http` or `https`.

title: LoadBalancerServiceHTTP
